resources.string: Insert SIM card to place calls
Slide the SIM card into the SIM card holder
Replace the battery and the back cover
Connecting to Wi-Fi may improve the speed of the setup process. Would you like to connect now?

"Going forward, Verizon can backup your media to safe online storage.
You can easily access the data you backup on this phone, from any Verizon phone you purchase in the future, or from the Verizon website."
I agree to the Terms of Service and choose what media to backup
I want to learn more about Verizon back up - Tell me more

"You have been provided with %s of free storage space to backup your media.
Verizon will continue to protect your phone's content by backing it up regularly to secure servers.
You can increase the amount of storage you have at any time by accessing V CAST Media Manager."

"Verizon can automatically backup the media from this phone to your Backup Assistant Plus online storage.
Press Next to choose what media to backup going forward."
Would you like to set up your Google account?
With a Google account, your contacts, calendar events, and email are automatically synchronized between your phone and your computer.
"Learn how to quickly enter text. Don't worry about pressing the right key every time - let the software correct it for you."
Your phone has been successfully configured. Select from the following options to learn more about your phone and My Verizon Mobile.
Try out HD Video with Beats Audio™
You can empower your account experience with My Verizon Mobile:
Please select a topic to view video tutorials. Press Close to exit.
Please select a topic to view video tutorials.
Personalizing your Home screen with widgets
Browsing Facebook and Flickr updates in People
Finding people quickly with smart dial
Your phone has been successfully configured. Select from the following options to learn more about your phone as well as Verizon Apps.
Videos introduction videos specific to the device
Learn more about other Verizon applications on your device.

Bring out your personality and make that phone your own with ringtones and Ringback Tones from V CAST Tones. Choose from hundreds of thousands of songs or sounds from your favorite artists. From Rap to Pop, Country to Metal, V CAST Tones has it all. Manage your ringtones and ringbacks, create your own jukeboxes, purchase and manage present jukeboxes and enjoy personalized recommendations all right on your handset.

"MOD 2.8 and lower Millions of songs right from your music capable phone.
V CAST Music enables you to shop for your favorite Songs from your favorite artists when you want right from your phone. See What’s New, What’s Hot & Browse by Album, Artist, Genre or Song. You can also search by album, artist or song/title.
MOD 3.x and higher Millions of songs right from your music capable phone.
V CAST Music enables you to shop for your favorite Songs, Ringtones and Ringback Tones. Plus you can save money with \"Bundles\" that combine select Songs, Ringtones and/or Ringback Tones together into different packages at a discounted price. Other exciting features supported include Jukeboxes, Playlists, Friend Recommendations, Wishlist, Artist Alerts & More!"

"What's that cool song? V CAST Song ID gets the titles, artists and album info for your favorite music instantly. From Jazz to Rap, Latin to House, Rock to Electronica & more. 1 click later you can preview or download the song from V CAST Music. Preview before you buy content. ID results not guaranteed."

V CAST delivers your favorite TV, Sports and Entertainment video On Demand and select content LIVE. Full Length episodes from all the major networks, great kids programming and the latest sports highlights.

This media and file management service includes online storage, plus many features to access, protect, share and play content from both the web and your phone. To learn more and subscribe visit www.verizonwireless.com/vmm.

Get more from your GPS than just the basics...premium voice navigation and 3D maps with traffic-aware routing and spoken incident alerts. PLUS: movie & event info, gas prices, local search, and voice-activated address entry.
"Visual Voice Mail lets you access & manage messages, so you don't have to dial Voice Mail. Scroll an inbox to listen to, erase or reply to messages. Immediately respond via callback or text."

City ID is an enhanced Caller ID feature that automatically displays the city and state of incoming calls. City ID provides tens of thousands of cities in North America, giving you an important tool to help identify unknown callers and more effectively manage your communications.

"Backup Assistant saves your phone's address book to a secure server. If your phone is lost or damaged, Backup Assistant restores your address book to a new phone. Subject to terms of use. Results may vary."

"Skype Mobile provides I See You, You See Me high quality video call service over 4G LTE network, so you can share a moment with your friends and family. Skype Mobile Video calls can be placed to any Skype end-point that is capable of receiving video e.g. mobile, or PC or TV. Making Video Calls is as simple as making a traditional voice call. You can initiate a video call from the start or to convert to a video call from a Skype voice call. Video Calling will start with the front-facing camera of your mobile phone, and then you can switch to the rear-facing camera seamlessly at will."
Slide out the keyboard to enter text
Please slide out the keyboard when you want to type
You can sync mail, contacts, and calendar events by settings up the following account types.
Unable to update the account status

"Your settings (such as your bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) can be backed up automatically to your Google Account. If you get a new phone, your existing settings are copied to the new phone.
You can change your backup settings at any time in the Settings application, under Privacy.
Back up my personal settings to my Google Account."
"Set up your favorite social networks and you'll be able to send and receive updates in People and Gallery"
Read and post updates in People and Gallery
View and upload pictures in Gallery
Read and post updates in HTC Peep
Read and post updates in Plurk
If you log out, you may lose the data you are uploading. Press Yes to log out or No to cancel.
An error has occurred. Please try again later.

"As part of our commitment to delivering the best network quality and device experience possible, this device is equipped with diagnostics software.
Consistent with T-Mobile's privacy policy, this software collects diagnostics data so that T-Mobile can better troubleshoot technical issues with your device or service.
Diagnostics data transmissions are free of charge and do not count toward your T-Mobile data usage.
The software does not capture the content of your calls or messages.
This function can be disabled by selecting Settings, then \"Privacy\" and \"Collect Diagnostics\"."
Yes, I want to share diagnostics data with T-Mobile.
Learn how to quickly enter text. Don’t worry about pressing the right key every time--let the software correct it for you.

Your phone can automatically download data to keep you updated with the latest Weather and Stock prices. If you do not have an unlimited data plan, choosing this option may result in additional charges from your wireless provider.
Unable to detect your current time zone. Please tap below to set time and date.
"Google's location service provides applications with your approximate location without using GPS."
You can disable these features in Settings, under Location and under Search.
"Allow Google's location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running."
Use My Location for Google searches and other Google services.
Please wait while your phone connects to Verizon Wireless and automatically activates.
There was a problem while activating your phone. Please contact the customer care.
Congratulations! Your phone is now active.
Use Location Services provided by Verizon Wireless

By selecting \"VZW Location Services\", you are enabling Verizon Wireless and third party authenticated and validated location services to access certain location information available through this device and/or the network.
What would you like to backup

"When \"Wi-Fi Only\" is selected, a Wi-Fi connection is required to backup your media. Backup will only occur over Wi-Fi.
When \"Wi-Fi or the Verizon Wireless data network\" is selected, the cellular network will be used when Wi-Fi is not available.
When using the cellular network, standard usage charges may apply, depending on your data plan or package."
Backup is currently setup to occur over Wi-Fi. For other Backup Options visit Settings -> Accounts & Sync -> Backup Assistant Plus and tap on Use Networks.
Do not show this message again
Use Location Services based on standalone GPS

By selecting \"Standalone GPS Services\", you are enabling access to all location information by any third party through the web, software, or any peripheral components you install, download, add or attach to the device, or by any other means. Enabling this functionality could pose certain risks to users of this device.
Use Location Services Provided by Google
Setting up accounts will allow you to access email, social networks and download new content to your phone.
Setting up accounts will allow you to access email, social networks and download new content to your tablet.
Sync mail, contacts, calendar events, social updates and more by setting up additional accounts.
Set up a Facebook account to view and upload the lastest from Facebook on your phone.
Set up a Facebook account to view and share your latest updates with Facebook.
You have successfully set up your Facebook account in HTC Sense. You may now read and post updates in People, Gallery, and Calendar, or chat with your friends in Facebook Chat.

Tell HTC is software that runs in the background on your phone, which allows HTC to collect anonymous information about how you use your phone. The key purpose of collecting this information is to make our phones easier and more fun to use. Please read the Tell HTC Privacy Statement to understand how HTC will collect and use this information.

Tell HTC is software that runs in the background on your tablet, which allows HTC to collect anonymous information about how you use your tablet. The key purpose of collecting this information is to make our tablets easier and more fun to use. Please read the Tell HTC Privacy Statement to understand how HTC will collect and use this information.
Allow HTC to collect and use anonymous information as described in the Tell HTC Privacy Statement.
"Are you sure you want to disable Tell HTC? We'd appreciate your help to improve our products and services."
Connecting to Wi-Fi may improve the speed of the setup process.
Disabling location collection will also disable use of the location service, which is needed for some applications to automatically update. Are you sure you want to disable the location service?
Unlocking your SIM card and setting up your phone…
Sync data for mail, contacts, calendar, weather and other services.
Don’t sync. I will sync my data manually.
If you don’t have an unlimited data plan, syncing data may result in additional charges from your wireless provider.
Some applications in this device require data network connection that must cause additional costs. We suggest you hire an internet data plan. More details with your service operator.
Use Yes 4G as your primary Internet connection.
Have a data plan with your wireless provider? Choose this one.
Don’t have a data plan? Choose this one.
I don’t have a data plan.
You can always change these options later in Settings.

"Press the \"Activate\" button to begin using your phone.
The activation process may take few moments.
Please wait while your phone is being activated."
There was a problem with activating your phone. Try again or contact the customer care.
There was a problem while activating your phone. Please contact the customer care.

"Congratulations!
Your new Verizon Wireless phone is now activated.
Your phone number is: %s"
Your settings (such as your bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) can be backed up automatically to your Google Account. Then, if you get a new HTC phone, your settings can be copied to your new phone.
You can change your backup settings at any time in Settings, under Privacy.
Back up my settings to my Google Account
Depending on the capabilities of your old phone, you may be able to move contacts and other data to your new HTC phone via Bluetooth.
Depending on the capabilities of your old phone, you may be able to move contacts and other data to your new HTC tablet via Bluetooth.
Transfer your stuff from your old phone to your new HTC phone via Bluetooth.
An HTC Sense account allows you to...
Download new HTC apps, widgets, wallpapers and more to your phone
Automatically share stuff with your friends who have HTC phones
Sync contacts from your default Gmail and Exchange accounts
You have successfully signed into your HTC Sense account. You can visit
Read and post updates in Kaixin001
Read and post updates in Sina weibo
Read and post updates in JiePang
Read and post updates in RenRen
This setup wizard will help you customize your phone in a few steps. It will allow you to get the most out of your Verizon Wireless phone by helping you:
It will also help you backup all your important data going forward.
Your progress is displayed at the bottom of the screen. You can skip steps at any time.

"This phone can determine its location which is useful for services such as navigation shopping and weather. To protect your privacy, make sure you trust the companies you are downloading from and read their privacy policies and disclosures carefully.
Remember, to control location and privacy settings go to the Settings menu."

"In order to backup your content going forward, Verizon needs you to connect to any of the previously listed Email accounts.
The Email account username and password will be used to restore all data to your future phones."

"You have been provided with 500MB of free storage space to backup your media.
Verizon will continue to protect your phone's content by backing it up regularly to secure servers.
You can increase the amount of storage you have at any time by accessing Backup Assistant Plus."

"We detected you have media from a previous phone stored with Verizon.
Verizon can automatically restore the media to this phone."
Restore media from my previous phone to this phone
After the setup process is finished, your media will be restored over Wi-Fi. If Wi-Fi is not available, the restore will be placed on hold on the pull-down notification bar.
